author: jkesselm
msg: James Riordan's bug -- Attributes on elements returned from
extensions were not being processed successfully. Turns out
our copying logic had a minor sequencing error.
I don't see anything similar listed in Bugzilla.

author: jkesselm
msg: Add support for xf:compare.
KNOWN LIMITATION: We don't yet support collations other than default
set into the Static Context. (And even that doesn't know how to map from
collation names to collators.)
KNOWN ISSUE: The spec is fruzzy about whether the collation name
is a URI, a relative URI, or a literal string. They show "deutch" as an
example, which suggests relative would be accepted -- but that's an
*extremely* fragile example, for obvious reasons. Awaiting comment
from them about whether it's a bad illustration or has exposed a hole
in their design.

author: mmidy
msg: Fix a couple bugs in regular expressions

author: ilene
msg: Patch for bugzilla#11834.  Replaced calls to DTM.getDocument with get
DTM.getDocumentRoot.

author: jkesselm
msg: Add support for xf:node-name().
UNSTABLE. They want us to return an "expanded QName",
but have not specified how it should behave. We probably need
an XQName class, but until we have those specs it may not make
sense to write one. This needs to be revisited.
